import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { AppContext } from "../../AppContext"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { Button, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import Paper from "@material-ui/core/Paper"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const localStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ headerWords: { color: "#011133", display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", marginTop: "30px", marginBottom: "10px", fontSize: "48px", fontWeight: "900", fontFamily: "Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif", }, smallerWords: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", marginBottom: "20px", fontSize: "24px", fontWeight: "900", fontFamily: "Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif", }, signInCard: { width: "250px", height: "410px", marginBottom: 50, border: "1px solid #f0f4f5", fontFamily: theme.typography.fontFamily, "&:hover": { border: `3px solid #f0cfb3`, }, }, cardContainer: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "row", justifyContent: "center", }, signInCardContainer: { paddingRight: 10, paddingLeft: 10, }, buttonLower: { backgroundColor: "#e4a773", color: "#011133", width: "150px", "&:hover": { backgroundColor: "#f0cfb3", }, }, })); const BuyersSvg = (props) => { return ( ); }; const OperatorSvg = (props) => { return ( ); }; const SellersSvg = (props) => { return ( ); }; const RenderSignUpControls = () => { const localClass = localStyles(); const [, setStateApp] = useContext(AppContext); return ( <>
Don't have an account? {/* Select your role to learn more now */}
LANDOWNERS
For owners and sellers of royalties or minerals looking to learn more about what they own
{ // setStateApp((stateApp) => ({ // ...stateApp, // signUpUserType: "LandOwner", // })); // }} >
MINERAL BUYERS
For buyers seeking potential deals and to streamline acquisition workflows
{ setStateApp((stateApp) => ({ ...stateApp, signUpUserType: "MineralBuyer", })); }} >
OPERATORS
For exploration and production companies seeking to streamline land acquisition
{ setStateApp((stateApp) => ({ ...stateApp, signUpUserType: "Operator", })); }} >
); }; export default RenderSignUpControls;
